title: Department and Title of Minister) Order 2016 (S.I. No. 421 of 2016)), having
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the National Oil Reserves Agency
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the National Oil Reserves Agency 

Act 2007 (Biofuel Obligation Rate) Order 2022. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 1 January 2022.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited national oil reserve agency act 2007 (biofuel obligation rate) order 2022 (2) order come operation 1 january 2022

title: Department and Title of Minister) Order 2016 (S.I. No. 421 of 2016)), having
heading: 2. The percentage rate referred to in section 44C(3)(b) of the
text_raw:
2. The percentage rate referred to in section 44C(3)(b) of the 
National Oil Reserves Agency Act 2007 (No. 7 of 2007) shall be 14.942 
per cent.
text_norm: 2 percentage rate referred section 44c(3)(b) national oil reserve agency act 2007 (no 7 2007) shall 14.942 per cent

title: Department and Title of Minister) Order 2016 (S.I. No. 421 of 2016)), having
heading: 3. The National Oil Reserves Agency Act 2007 (Biofuel Obligation Rate)
text_raw:
3. The National Oil Reserves Agency Act 2007 (Biofuel Obligation Rate) 

Order 2019 (S.I. No. 38 of 2019) is revoked. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

1 January 2022. 

EAMON RYAN 

Minister for the Environment, Climate and 
Communications. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 21st January, 2022.
